title: Kelsey Peszek, NNP
bio:
> I strive to provide comprehensive and collaborative care to support optimal health for children.

Kelsey grew up in the suburbs of Denver and earned both her Bachelors degree in Nursing and her Masters in Advanced Practice Nursing from the University of Colorado-Anschutz Medical Campus. Kelsey joined Academy Park Pediatrics in 2014 as a registered nurse and is excited to continue career here as a nurse practitioner. She resides in Parker with her husband, Jack, and their daughter, Emma.

Kelsey is a Certified Pediatric Nurse Practitioner and an active member of the National Association of Pediatric Nurse Practitioners.
